name: customize squid game roblox theme
description:
CUSTOMIZABLE ROBLOX THEME!!! I based mine on the netflix show the squid game but you can put your own photo. I added photos of the fornt man, Sae - Byeok, games and more. Stay tuned for color customization and more wallpaper options in the next few days!!
To customize slick  customize settings and choose which image you want, then install / update style. Enjoy!

style_setting_options.label: First Game: Red light Green light
